Title: Sri Lanka Crisis: What’s next for the Island nation? | Unbreak the News with Prema Sridevi
Narrative:
Sri Lanka has been facing its worst economic crisis in decades. On Saturday, protesters in Sri Lanka set Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe’s house on fire. Thousands of protesters also stormed Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa’s presidential palace. Angry Lankans have now taken it upon themselves to make their government accountable for the debilitating economic crisis. The protests have resulted in both the Prime Minister and the President agreeing to step down. But what is the future of Sri Lanka going to be? Who will inherit the governance of the country which is embroiled in a massive social, economic and humanitarian crisis? Prema Sridevi UnBreaks this News for you!

Watch it here:- https://youtu.be/HvmY9yqpf3k
Interest: the probe, sri lanka economic crises
